(b) the relationship between its material risks and opportunities arising from impacts and

14. When fulfilling the requirements of paragraph 48, the undertaking shall disclose whether all
people in its own workforce who could be materially impacted by the undertaking are included
in the scope of its disclosure under ESRS 2. These material impacts shall include impacts that
